HotelElement.Name: Park & Suites Elegance Lyon Gerland (Foremerly City Suites)

Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Park & Suites Elégance Lyon Gerland places you in the heart of Lyon, convenient to Centre d'Histoire de la Resistance et de la Deportation and Stade Gerland. This family-friendly residence is within close proximity of Ecole Normale Superieure de Lyon and Halle Tony Garnier.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 122 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and microwaves. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Irons/ironing boards and cribs/infant beds (surcharge) are available on request.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Ecole Normale Superieure de Lyon - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Halle Tony Garnier - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi

The nearest airports are:
Lyon (XYD-Part-Dieu SNCF Train Station) - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Lyon (LYN-Lyon Bron) - 8 km / 5 mi
Lyon (LYS-Saint-Exupery) - 18.4 km / 11.4 mi

The preferred airport for Park & Suites Elégance Lyon Gerland is Lyon (LYS-Saint-Exupery).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
